about.hero.title: Where Style Meets Influence
about.hero.subtitle: LikeThem is the exclusive platform where fashion influencers curate their personal stores. We bridge the gap between inspiration and acquisition—dress like the ones you admire.
about.story.title: Our Story
about.story.paragraph1: LikeThem was born from a simple observation: people don't just follow influencers for content—they follow them for style, for taste, for that intangible ability to know what looks good. But the journey from inspiration to wardrobe has always been fragmented, frustrating, and impersonal.
about.story.paragraph2: We created LikeThem to change that. This is a platform where influencers don't just post—they curate. Each store is a carefully selected collection of pieces that represent their personal aesthetic. No mass-market algorithms, no endless scrolling through generic products. Just authentic, curated fashion from people whose style you trust.
about.story.paragraph3: LikeThem isn't for everyone, and that's by design. We believe in quality over quantity, curation over chaos, and exclusivity over accessibility. This is fashion reimagined for the digital age—personal, intentional, and direct.
about.howItWorks.title: How It Works
about.howItWorks.subtitle: A curator-driven model that puts style first
about.howItWorks.step1.title: Curators Apply
about.howItWorks.step1.description: We handpick influencers and style creators who demonstrate exceptional taste and a genuine connection with their audience. Not everyone gets in—that's what makes it special.
about.howItWorks.step2.title: They Curate
about.howItWorks.step2.description: Each curator builds their personal store with pieces they genuinely love and recommend. These aren't paid promotions—they're authentic selections from their own wardrobes and wishlist.
about.howItWorks.step3.title: You Discover
about.howItWorks.step3.description: Browse curated collections from creators whose style resonates with you. Request access to exclusive 'Inner Circle' pieces, limited drops, and one-of-a-kind items directly from their closets.
about.values.title: What We Believe
about.values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.values.exclusivity.title: Exclusivity
about.values.exclusivity.description: Not everyone gets access. We believe in selective curation—both of our curators and our community. Scarcity creates value, and value creates meaning.
about.values.curation.title: Curation Over Algorithm
about.values.curation.description: Every piece on LikeThem is handpicked by a real person with real taste. No bots, no generic recommendations—just intentional, thoughtful selections.
about.values.quality.title: Quality Over Quantity
about.values.quality.description: We're not trying to be the biggest fashion platform. We're trying to be the best. Fewer, better pieces. Fewer, better curators. Fewer, better experiences.
about.values.community.title: Creator-First
about.values.community.description: Curators aren't just content creators on LikeThem—they're entrepreneurs. They own their stores, control their pricing, and keep the majority of their earnings. We succeed when they succeed.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.statement: To create the most exclusive, curated fashion marketplace on the internet—where influence translates to commerce, and style is more than just content.
about.cta.title: Join the Movement
about.cta.subtitle: Whether you're looking to discover curated fashion or become a curator yourself, LikeThem is where your style journey begins.
about.team.title: Built by Style Obsessives
about.team.description: LikeThem is built by a small team of designers, developers, and fashion enthusiasts who believe that taste matters, curation is everything, and the future of fashion is personal.
